title: Ep. 159 - One Of The Most Disgusting Media Hit Jobs Ever
description:
Kyler Murray won the Heisman so the media decided to dig through his old tweets to try and destroy him. What is the point of this repeated exercise? Also, a teacher was fired for refusing to pretend that a girl is a boy. And the International Space Station captured footage of an alien spacecraft. Date: 12-10-2018
